ygData.msgSnippet: Aracnia made her way to the bridge to find Rampage and his diciples scattered about the room. Aracnia was in control, Rampage was just going to hae to learn.

    Aracnia made her way to the bridge to find Rampage and his diciples 
scattered about the room. Aracnia was in control, Rampage was just going to 
hae to learn. But she would need a little more muscle if she was going to 
take the throne....
    She took a seat at the scanners, not even glanceing at the giant crab 
sitting on his lazy rear doing nothing.  She turned on the scanners to see a 
new Predacon male, a large, very powerfuly armed, Predacon male nearing the 
ship. 
    Her eyes lit up and she dashed from the ship, down the ramp. Armed with 
her bowcaster she made her way into the forest that surrounded the ship.
OOC: Im not comfortable with the Predacon ship being in the desert. I would 
like it somewhere with a little more dense foliage. On the edge of a jungle 
or somewhere.
    Aracnia saw him. He was crimsom from head to toe, except he had black 
knee and elbow armor, and black armor on his chest. His eyes glowed like two 
emeralds in a firestorm.
    
    Paralysis saw the widow for a good five minutes sneaking around like she 
thought she was totally hidden from him. The toad was smarter than that. He 
used Invra-red scanning and found her ducking behinde a bsh, stareing.
    "Ah, a Predacon mistress. Now I can get some answers...." He trailed off 
thudding closer to her tiny body.

    She gasped, "He must see me!"
    Black Aracnia grabbed her bowcaster and shot up through the leaves to 
find Paralysis' large muscular body looming over her, holding his pisol to 
her.
    She hissed, "Dont try anything! I have three others with me watching you 
right now!" Her words were sharp and to the point.
    The toad pursed his lips and laughed. "Liar. Your alone. I know you are 
because my I.R. scanners didnt pick anyone else up."
    Aracnia shighed and brought her wepon down, surrendering to this new bot. 
He seemed to know enough, and was big enough to take out Rampage in a bare 
knuckle fist fight.
    "So, why are you stalking me?" He asked.
    Aracnia looked him over. "I didnt want to scare you....or accidently kill 
you."
    He smiled and dropped his wepon into its holster. He put his rather large 
hand on her shoulder. "Ah, I see. Well, prehaps you can take me to the 
Predacon base, if there is one?"
    Aracnia took her chance. "Im the commander. Well, actually, Im the 
soon-to-be commander. I just need your help."
    His eyes widened at this news. "Oh really?"
    "Yes. Im going to need a little more muscle to take the thorne. Im the 
smarter, more involved leader in the ranks. I deserve it." She said.
    Paralysis began to move, now with his arms drapping her shoulder. "Lets 
return to the base and talk more there. Its starting to rain out here and I 
would like to see our base of operations."
    Aracnia tightened her grip on her bowcaster as she shoved him away. 
"We'll go to the ship, but touch me agian and you'll lose that arm!"
